name: Local Users
description: Modules related to inventorying local users

library-parse-local-users.name: library-parsed-local-users
library-parse-local-users.description: Parse local users from /etc/passwd on the system with their attributes from /etc/shadow

inventory-local-users.name: inventory-local-users
inventory-local-users.description: Inventory the local users on the system with their attributes

inventory-local-users-locked.name: inventory-local-users-locked
inventory-local-users-locked.description: Inventory the local users on the system that are locked

inventory-local-users-password-empty.name: inventory-local-users-password-empty
inventory-local-users-password-empty.description: Inventory the local users on the system that do not have a password set
